The game will be hard to grasp at first especially if you don't have a lot of experience with First Person Shooters (FPS) games, but when you dive into it it can be very intuitive. 

The game has aspects of strategy, shooting, communication and most of all fun.

Remember CS:Source? Well CS:GO takes everything good about the weapon handling and responsiveness of that and just catapults it right into the sea. 

Actual garbage.

I have in total 500hours in this game.I would recomend it to people that dont rage so easly beacause it has lots of cheaters.But not in prime.In prime it is playable  and really fun.The downsides are that you need to know russian or you need a team because if you are solo with russians they will kick you and trash talk you.

Things i gave to Counter - Strike :
1. Money
2. Time
3. Love

Things Counter - Strike gave me :
1. Arthritis
2. Rage
3. R*tarded Russian, Hungarian and Russian kids and some Iranian kids
4. R*tarded teammates
5. Broken keyboard
6. Broken mouse
7. 9/10 ready
8. Server crashes
11. Cheaters
12. 64 tick servers

Essentially - CS is a greedy woman , but i love her all the time.
